title: [Pig Puddle Lane, Dirt Road]
description: The road ends here in a cluster of ramshackle buildings, one an abandoned tavern.  Its faded sign hangs at an angle, but you can still make out the name, "The Bedbug Inn."  Weeds have grown up through the floorboards out front, providing lunch for a fat, flop-eared hare squatting there.
